TopicTitle: What is the coordinates for [Easter Egg Spoiler] on kerbin?

Articles.Content:
I need the exact coordinates (Kerbin desert temple) (AKA Longitude and Latitude), it is to help me with a youtube video I am making! Thanks!

Edited May 26, 2013 by Ascensiam

You can find it here: http://www.kerbalmaps.com/

Or I could tell you that it says "-6.5057 : -141.6856"
Is this thing gone in .21? I flew over that area looking for it for quite a while, no luck finding it.

Yeah I have been unable to see it. A Admin told me to turn my Terrain level up to High or Default (but it was already on Default) but that did nothing to help besides lower the ground a few feet. The Temple is currently about 20 meters bellow the surface. Just a bug with the new terrain generator.

Yeah, after the new terrain generation, they didn't move the temple to account for the new world height... Now it's buried.

OR a sudden sandstorm blew over the Kerbin desert, leaving the ancient temple lost and buried under a dune... maybe one day, another great sandstorm by the name of 0.21.2 will re-reveal this ancient treasure

Is this thing gone in .21? I flew over that area looking for it for quite a while, no luck finding it.

No, but it's moved a little, it's hidden in the mountains near that location

In 0.21 the temple is still MIA.

But since we are more than 6 months later than the last post in this thread and are playing 0.23 it is back again.
It is above ground again.

Have fun with my old Thread

!!SPOILER!!!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60551-Spoiler-Easter-Egg-Stocktake-0-23-%28Done%21%29-Pic-Heavy

It is above ground again.

http://i.imgur.com/I2qtPsr.png

Thank you for this picture!

Thank you for this picture!

You are welcome, but it keep in mind that I haven't been there in the current version, so who knows, it might be buried again by now.

You are welcome, but it keep in mind that I haven't been there in the current version, so who knows, it might be buried again by now.

It is not
